name: Student Council
description:
It's election day and you must win. Talk with all your classmates and try and convince them to vote for you! 

But when things don't go as planned, what will you do?  Who will help you? 

Features: 

  • 6 endings 
  • 30-60 minutes of playtime 
  • Original art and story
  • Available on Mac and  Windows

Download Instructions: 

  1. Download the right ZIP file for your platform (either Windows or Mac OS) 
  2. On windows - extract the file and then open Student Council.exe
    1. Click more information then allow when it asks you about security (I don' t have a proper developers license yet :c ) 
  3. On mac - There's a setting that will allow you to run the game or you could right click and click open then hit allow for it to run
